pageContext.claim: “If Democrats get the majority, one of their first projects will be a socialist takeover of American healthcare -- you've been seeing it -- meaning taxes like you've never seen before.”
pageContext.analysis: Questions have been raised about the financing and cost for Sen. Bernie Sanders's (I-Vt.) "Medicare-for-All" plan but if implemented, the plan would actually expand benefits for seniors on Medicare. Plus, not all Democrats have signed on to this plan, nor can Democrats unilaterally raise taxes to pay for it.
